code: import React from"react";import pic_acheron from'./screenshots/multiple-point-shadows.png';import pic_hyperion from'./screenshots/screenshot68.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(args){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap my-3 mx-3 bg-slate-800 rounded-xl shadow-xl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"object-cover lg:min-h-96 rounded-t-xl max-w-full",src:args.image}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"px-5 py-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"font-bold",children:args.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:args.text})]})]});}var Projects=function Projects(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative text-gray-300 px-10 py-10",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid md:grid-cols-2 xl:grid-cols-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{title:"Acheron3D",image:pic_acheron,text:"A 3D OpenGL game engine written in C99 for fast game development."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{title:"Hyperion Engine",image:pic_hyperion,text:"A powerful Vulkan based game engine built for modern features and fast speed."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{title:"Pop Kernel",image:pic_hyperion,text:"An x86 kernel written in C and Assembler for learning, writing drivers and testing hardware."})]})]});};export default Projects;
